metadata.name: Drop Falling into Water
metadata.description:
Photography always has a language. In documentary photography, landscape photography or portfolio photography. Every photograph has a language and a story. The name of this edition is "Drop in Water". I created this work underwater. Every different photo has different moments.


License:  
Extended Editorial: Can be used to display privately, or in commercial and non-commercial settings, or in groups with an unlimited number of participants. The license includes unlimited display in virtual or physical galleries, documentaries, and essays by the NFT holder.
